title: Windmill Live wallpaper
summary: Fragment of a rural life on the screen of your phone or Android Wear watch.

descriptionHTML:
Windmill and Pond Live Wallpaper - Now for FREE!!
* Android wear Watch Face inside!!

Fragment unhurried rural life on the screen of your phone. Rotating blades of the windmill, slowly floating clouds reflects on the water surface pond!
The background changes depend on the time of day!

Live wallpaper features:
★ There is a windmill, with which you can interact;
★ Night mode
★ Clouds

Settings:
★ Time of day: in real time and manual setting
★ Stars;
★ Shooting stars;
★ Speed of clouds


Our first job - Live Wallpaper "Windmill and the pond."
Vector Graphic Design by artist Sergey Kolesov.
